description:
Currently the update_available_resource only update the instance which still located on the host. 

This leads after resize, still have allocation record on the old host. Also when instance removed locally from db and compute node is offline, after comptue node startup, the allocation record won't be cleanup.
title: The allocation record can't be removed after migration/failure
